description: A high-frequency trading (HFT) algorithm executes trades throughout a normal trading day.  The algorithm is designed to identify and exploit small market inefficiencies.  Its performance is monitored for compliance and adherence to pre-defined risk parameters.
initial_goal: Maximize profit within risk tolerance parameters while adhering to all regulatory guidelines and exchange rules.
enterprise_context: High-frequency trading (HFT) within the context of a major stock exchange
